      • createGame

        public void createGame(int numberOfPlayers,
              Rules rules,
              java.lang.String mapPath)
        Function that is called when the user on the server has configured the match. It then already start the match with the first turn being executed.
        Overrides:
        createGame in class Model
        Parameters:
        numberOfPlayers - , Rules of the match, hex mapPath in String format
        rules - type of rules that the game will follow
        mapPath - name of the map

      • getGameEvent

        public GameEvent getGameEvent()

      • getNextPlayer

        public Player getNextPlayer(ServerModel.TypeOfPlayer typePlayer)
        Function that returns the next player ID when the client connects. If the player is the first one, the currentPlayer of the already started match is assigned to him. Then the nextPlayerToReturn is updated, to save the index of the next player to get. When another player connects, if the nextPlayerToReturn has already surpassed the size of the list, gets the one in first position. Then it updates the total number of players.
        Parameters:
        typeOfPlayer - that request the actions. The first one is always the currentPlayer, the others are the OTHER type of Players.

      • isModelInitialized

        public boolean isModelInitialized()
        Function that checks if the game is initialized and the players'hexmap and rules have all been set.
        Parameters:
        nothing -

      • endTurn

        public void endTurn(Player player,
           java.util.List<java.lang.String> log)
        Overridden function that just ends the turn and returns the event. It does NOT inform the view.
        Overrides:
        endTurn in class Model
        Parameters:
        Player - requesting the endTurn the others are the OTHER type of Players.

      • notifyViewObserver

        public void notifyViewObserver(GameEvent event)
        Function that calls the ChangeAndNotifyObservers of the Model, which is protected.
        Parameters:
        GameEvent - to signal to the view.
